text.content: Suddenly our shortcomings don't seem to matter at much  Your IQ is 20 points low  And I'm no Six Foot Hot Look All American Man    Sad to say I pushed you away  Waiting for Mrs. Right You never gave up  Devotion  Waiting for me  You'll always be my girlfriend  I too am waiting for you  I'll always be your friend    I commend your stubbornness  Without it we'd never got this far  I am done with perfection  Chasing her leaves me with nothing but pain    Unlike you  She isn't true  She's got her own concerns  You never gave up
